mapper.select: SELECT acr.COURSE_RECORD_ID AS courseRecordId, acr.COURSE_ID AS courseId, acr.CREATE_TIME AS createTime, acr.ALL_COUNT AS allCount, acr.SINGED_COUNT AS singedCount, acr.ABSENT_COUNT AS absentCount, acr.LATE_COUNT AS lateCount, acr.PASS_COUNT AS passCount, acr.NO_PASS_COUNT AS noPassCount, CASE WHEN TO_DAYS( NOW( ) ) = TO_DAYS( acr.CREATE_TIME ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS isToday FROM APP_COURSE_RECORD acr WHERE acr.COURSE_ID = #{courseId} ORDER BY acr.CREATE_TIME DESC
